law.catch_line: Any person who knowingly and willfully violates the provisions of this Part V is guilty of a misdeme...

text.section: Any person who knowingly and willfully violates the provisions of this Part V is guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction is subject to a fine of not more than $1,000.

If the person is a business entity and not a natural person, each officer and partner of the business entity who knowingly authorized or participated in the violation is guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction is subject to the same penalties as the business entity.
The provisions of this Part V shall be enforced by the State's Attorney for Montgomery County.
